mapper.insert: insert into product(bookNo, category, bookName, writer, publisher, pubYear, price, stock, description, imageFileName) values(seq_bookNo.nextval, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisher, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubYear, jdbcType=DATE}, #{price, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product set bookName = #{bookName}, writer = #{writer}, publisher = #{publisher}, description = #{description}, stock=#{stock}, pubYear = #{pubYear}, price= #{price}, imageFileName = #{imageFileName} where bookNo = #{bookNo}
mapper.select: SELECT rownum, t.* FROM (SELECT p.* FROM Product p order by DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) t WHERE rownum < 7
SELECT * FROM product order by bookNo
select * from product where category = #{category} order by bookNo
